definitions.title: vb. set, make
definitions.body: (v. BH; for Pers. infl. on usage cf. Scheft:65);—
make, acc. [[טְעֵם]] = make decree Da 3:10, Ezr 6:1, Ezr 6:12 + vb. fin. v:Ezr 6:8, + inf. Ezr 4:21, Ezr 5:13 and (c. [[ל]] pers.) v:Ezr 5:3, v:Ezr 5:9.
make, appoint, one’s name Da 5:12 (2 acc.), one to office Ezr 5:14 (2 acc.).
set, fix, acc. [[בָּל]] mind, Da 6:15 (c. inf.); acc. [[טְעֵם]] Da 3:12, Da 6:14 pay due regard ([[טְעֵם]]) to ([[עַל]] pers.).

definitions.title: Pe‘îl
definitions.body: 3 ms. [[מִנִּי שִׂים טְעֵם]] Ezr 4:19, from me a decree is made, so Ezr 5:17, Ezr 6:8, Ezr 6:11, Ezr 7:13, Ezr 7:21, Da 3:29, Da 4:3, Da 6:27; lit. 3 fs. [[שֻׂמַת]] (rd. prob. [[שִׂימַת]] K:§ 45, Belsp. 1. d)) Da 6:18 (of stone, [[עַל]] loc.).

definitions.title: Hithpe.
definitions.body: be made: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִתְּשָׂם]] Ezr 4:24 (of decree, [[סטְעֵס]] c. [[מִן]] agent.); 3 mpl. [[יִתְּשָׂמוּן]] Da 2:5 subj. rei + n. pred. be made into; Pt. Ezr 5:8 lit. be set, laid, of wood, [[ב]] of wall.
